name: The Patriots: Baby Edition
description:
The Patriots : Baby edition is a free action / shooter game with a beautiful low poly graphic.

Story

The game is about a Baby named Nick who lives with his parents in a small town. One day, suddenly, explosions and an alarms sounded. Military vehicles move in the city. Television reports say a group has staged a coup against the government, seized power and imprisoned the president. The baby takes up arms and joins the resistance to save his country.

Game Features

  • Beautiful low poly style graphic
  • Strong baby protagonist
  • Fun and exciting action/shooter gameplay
  • Easy to pick up and play
